code: import React from'react';import{AutoRenewIcon,Flex,Heading}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import orderBy from'lodash/orderBy';import{useTeams}from'state/teams/hooks';import Page from'components/Layout/Page';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import TeamListCard from'./components/TeamListCard';import TeamHeader from'./components/TeamHeader';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Teams=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const{teams,isLoading}=useTeams();const teamList=Object.values(teams);const topTeams=orderBy(teamList,['points','id','name'],['desc','asc','asc']);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Page,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamHeader,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",mb:"32px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{scale:"xl",children:t('Teams')}),isLoading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AutoRenewIcon,{spin:true})]}),topTeams.map((team,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamListCard,{rank:index+1,team:team},team.id))]});};export default Teams;
